comment: The Sort enum's members are created using functools.partial, which is a bit unconventional for readability. Enum values can be lambda functions directly or even better, method references.

title: Improve understandability
comment: The list_tasks method can have the sorting logic refactored to a separate method for clarity.

The exit() call in the interact_with_app method will globally exit Python and may not be desirable if the TodoListApp is to be used as part of a larger program. Consider raising an exception or setting a flag to break from the loop.

title: Date Formatting
comment: Representation of the task's creation date might benefit from a formatted string for better readability.

The exit case in the Option enum's __str__ method raises a NotImplementedError as a default case. A default case in an Enum's __str__ method may not be necessary, and this behavior could be confusing.

title: Improve error handling for robustness
comment: The method does not gracefully handle the incorrect input from the user.

title: Negative index error handling
comment: There's no error handling for user index that is negative.
